transcript:
The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can
Hello.
Hello. Hanji.
Ji very good evening sir. Good evening.
Ji main Deepak baat kar raha hun sir India Mart head office se. Hmm hmm. Aapne sir abhi customer customer care helpline pe call kiya tha Preeti mam se aapki baat hui hogi. Hmm. To abhi sir yahan pe concern open ho jata hai. To mam ne aapko samjha diya sab kuch hum ek bar video meeting kar lenge. Video meeting aap kal morning me kar lijiye 10 baje. Accha 10 baje kal morning me. To yahan pe jo concern open open hai sir isko band kar dete hain kal morning me fir main aapse discuss kar lunga. Kaise band kar dijiyega sir mera concern hai ki main jitna paisa laga ke lead nahi aa raha hai. Haan. Accha kaise main close kar dunga. To fir to fir to fir to aap mujhe ek kam kijiyega. Kal mujhe detail me bataiyega sir ki kya kya commitment matlab services me kya kya promises aapko ki gayi hai. Aap mujhe sara kuch bataiyega. Uske according sir hum usme work on kar lenge. Abhi main concern nahi close kar raha hun. Thik hai. Thik hai. Thik hai sir. Kal morning kitne baje kar lun sir? 10 baje. Thik hai, thik hai, thik hai. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting leads despite investing money.

- Wants to know why concern is being closed.



Resolution:

- Executive will not close the concern.

- Executive will discuss the issue in detail tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call customer tomorrow at 10 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meeting, concern, commitments
